items.title: Nuclear power plant forced to shut down after jellyfish infestation
items.description: A 'massive and unpredictable' swarm of jellyfish entered the plant's pumping stations.

items.title: Feline felon has paw printed and mugshots taken after scratching police officers
items.description: The feline felon was let off with a warning not to bite anyone in the future.

items.title: ‘I tried to save doomed caver from most horrifying death imaginable – here’s why I couldn’t’
items.description: His body remains trapped in the cave to this day.

items.title: Body of man missing for 28 years found ‘perfectly preserved’ in glacier
items.description: Naseeruddin vanished in 1997 after a family dispute.

items.title: Rat the size of a dog found as monster vermin run riot in Yorkshire village
items.description: The dead rodent - potentially record-breaking because of its size – has been likened by witnesses to a small dog.
